detailsData.title: Raw Experience
detailsData.content: We are not your run-of-the-mill law firm. Our founding attorney, Arique Dross III, brings his unique personal journey from adversity to triumph into our practice.

detailsData.title: Insightful Representation
detailsData.content: Our commitment to providing insightful representation is shaped by lived personal and professional experiences. We ensure that our clients' needs are anticipated, their rights defended, and their stories heard.

detailsData.title: Strategic Solutions
detailsData.content: We believe in crafting strategic solutions that are tailored to each client's unique circumstances. We provide solutions designed to safeguard our clients' interests and achieve their objectives.

detailsData.title: Client Advocacy
detailsData.content: We deliver an attorney-client relationship rooted in client advocacy and relentless representation. Our approach is characterized by tailored guidance and strategic representation.

address: One Liberty Plaza,165 Broadway - 23rd Floor,New York, NY 10006
valueProp: In-court legal experience combined with out-of-court real-life experience allows us to fully empathize with our clients, delivering an attorney-client relationship rooted in client advocacy and relentless representation. An unparalleled fusion of in-court legal experience and real-world lived experience, enables us to genuinely understand our client's unique needs and circumstances, and deliver an elevated attorney-client relationship characterized by tailored guidance, relentless advocacy, and strategic representation.

testimonalData.text: Attorney Arique Dross represented me and walked me through an harassment charge I had against a family member. He fought for me and was extremely assertive with the opposing counsel.
testimonalData.author: Maria McDonald

testimonalData.text: Highly recommend. Professional, and great experience. Dealing with my situation, Arique’s performance gave me confidence and hope, for a situation most people would fold under.
testimonalData.author: Justin Marrero

testimonalData.text: Mr. Dross is one of the best attorneys I’ve ever had the pleasure of dealing with. He is patient, knowledge, and ALWAYS reachable. He was always prepared in court and was very accurate in his predictions about the moves of the opposing counsel.
testimonalData.author: Lawreece Fluellen
